price: 109. Shaki ma leh, inay Aakhirada ahaan kuwa khasaari.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
